/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, divided by a median, is filled with a variety of vehicles including cars, buses, and trucks, all moving in different directions. The overcast sky above casts a gray hue over the scene, while the trees lining the street add a touch of green to the otherwise urban landscape. The image is slightly blurry, adding a sense of motion and dynamism to the scene.
